thread.title: Anonsen Carl

author: Anonsen Carl
title: Anonsen Carl
text: I got the car I ordered in an immaculate condition and big enough for the four of us with quite some luggage. The car worked well throughout the rental period (7 days.) The type of car was perhaps a bit underpowered for all of us and the gear shift a bit unprecise or took some time to get used to. Delivery at the airport was easy and the person taking the delivery was fantastic.
